attributes.action: Slow and regulate Foreign Investment in the UK housing market
attributes.additional_details: Unfortunately it seems that no matter how hard you try you're unable to get onto the property ladder without hearing the tales of Foreign Investment in housing which closes the market to UK nationals as they're using overseas capital to buy up property just to rent them out.
attributes.background: Slow Foreign investment and nationals from buying properties in the UK with the express desire to rent them out and creating an unfair market for those wanting to get onto the property ladder by using overseas money as capital for UK owned mortgages. The Mortgage systems needs more regulation.

rejection.details: While we can see that you're concerned about non-UK citizens buying and renting out UK properties, it's not clear exactly what policy you'd like the Government to implement. Your petition needs to clearly say how the Government would slow or regulate investment.
